column1: Straight Is The Gate & Narrow Is The Way Which Leads To Life & Few There Be That Find It! Are You Part of The Few? Do You Have A Strong Relationship With Jesus Christ? Even With The #Coronavirus, #COVID19, #CoronavirusOutbreak, Does This Place Still Feel Like Home? Seek Jesus

The Bible Doesn't Lie & There Are Few Who Will Be Raptured Alive! There Will Be Billions of The Dead In Christ Raptured! Only Millions Who Are Alive & Remain! Are You Part of The Few? Or Does The Daily News of The #Coronavirus, #COVID19, #CoronavirusOutbreak Keep You Going?

As The #Coronavirus, #COVID__19, #CoronavirusOutbreak Seems To Be The Topic of Discussion! Have You Had or Done A Heart Check Today? Did You #Repent of Your Sins To Jesus Christ & Kept Your Garments Clean; Without Spot, Wrinkle or Blemish? It's All About Jesus Christ, Seek Him

As The #Coronavirus, #COVID__19, #CoronavirusOutbreak Continues! Do You Like Living In Sin? If So How Does This World Feel To You? This Is Why We Need To #Repent & Seek Jesus Christ! Meaning Pick Up Your Cross & Follow Him, Seeking The Will of Father God Almighty! Seek Jesus
